name: Fun Guy Love Connection
description:
Feeling lonely, want to put down roots? Your mission as Fun Guy the arbor amour dating coach to connect hot birches in your area.

Control Fun Guy as he navigates the alien planet on a mission to connect lonely trees together, his mission is fun, his mission is pure, his mission is amour.

Programming: IAmDirt
Sound: BrianDiamondMusic
Art: Yohapii
